scripts.test:api-security: newman run postman/Bosta_Task_IV.postman_collection.json --env-var "authToken1=$AUTH_TOKEN1" --env-var "authToken3=$AUTH_TOKEN3" --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "Bosta Task IV Security Suite" --timeout-request 30000
